## Observation notes  
First documented by Smith, 1861, with extensive historical record in the Pacific Maritime (see Best list for historical record to 2000). Tommasi et al. 2004: <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Greater <span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span></span> Area</span>. Ratti et al. 2008: <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>. Guzman et al., 2023: (Neame), 2007, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. iNaturalist: <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>, from 2010.
